response.overview: In a realm where ancient magic and martial prowess intertwine, Dragon League unleashes an epic saga of fantasy, conflict, and camaraderie. When a once-peaceful kingdom is threatened by dark forces, a legendary league of warriors must rise to protect their world from impending doom.
response.tagline: In a realm where ancient magic and martial prowess intertwine, Dragon League unleashes an epic saga of fantasy, conflict, and breathtaking adventure.
response.title: Dragon League
